name: Boboto Inc.
description:
Boboto is in trouble and need to deliver the correct boxes to save his business! 

The boxes are heavy and his box-making machines are malfunctional and sometimes create the wrong box in the wrong place!

WASD - to move 

Space bar - to Jump

J | Left Mouse | Fire 1 - To grab/drop boxes

K | Right Mouse | Fire 2 - To Throw Boxes
